Garden_Grove.Ronald Reagan Federal Building and Court: The Ronald Reagan Federal Building and Courthouse at 411 West Fourth Street in Santa Ana, California, is an eleven-story Federal courthouse facility on 3.94 acres (15,900 m2) that includes courtrooms, judges chambers, offices and courtroom galleries of the United States District Court for the Central District of California. Renamed for former President and California Governor Ronald Reagan in 1992, the building is owned by the General Services Administration and is 176 ft (54 m) tall.
